Hi Sir, mujhe Data analyst ka course karna hai... mujhe Data Analyst ka course kahan se karna chahiye.. main already operations mein job kar rha hu as manager, but main apna career switch karna chahta hu, data analysis and data science ki taraf... pls advise me, i'm from Delhi..

Main plan kar rha tha Data Analyst ka course from SimpliLearn but i want to give a second thought to my decision. And as per my discussion with them they said k mujhe module k 5mein se 2 topic khud se karne padenge and once I clear the assessment, tabhi main next modules k liye eligible ho paunga.. 

Yeh Baat unhone mujhe pahle nhi btayi... jab maine further dig down kiya tab pta chala.. and the bad thing is k unhone kahan yeh assessment wala kaam tmhe enroll karne k baad karna hoga.. Maine unko bola k yeh kaam tmhe enroll karne se pahle karwana chahiye and tmhe apne kuch free program rakhne chahiye ki pahle inka certification clear karo and then apply for this course.. what if i enroll and not able to clear the assessment, mere paise toh gye Paani mein... unhone bola k hum backend team se tmhe extra chance dilwa denge assessment clear karne k liye... but uska kya faayda jab mujhe kuch samajh hi nhi aayega and main course mein enroll b kar lu. Ab main plan kar rha hu k pahle udemy se koi course pick kar lu data analyst ka so that I understand the concepts and then I will enroll in SimpliLearn for certification purpose...

If anyone wish to join simplilearn. Just listen to my story. What points specified in this video is exactly true.

we cont according to terms and policies. Every month EMI raises, bank levy high charges, mental Pressures everything. 


Moral of the story "being educated...pleassssee  don't get fooled by marketing and advertising strategies of SIMPLILEARN"

Name: Rajdeep Deb
Comment:
You should give a straight away review rather than gossiping around it.

There are many platforms and course sites that offer sealed certifications on data analytics and big data and data science etc but WHAT MATTERS THE MOST IS KNOWLEDGE AND NOT A CERTIFICATION. 

The recruiters or company HR knows there are many courses over the internet and anybody with a smartphone can do certifications. But finally in the interview if they ask u one core question and u sit their awestuck than there is no point of such bunch of certifications.

Talking about simplilearn, it's a good platform to learn about the above subjects however u need to first ask the coordinator to send u the detailed content and some sample videos of their lecturers giving lectures. After that yu can decide whether to join or not.

Often lectures by desi guys in English doesn't make tat impact which a British accent does. However it's just a point.
